record.dc:title: 12MCL6, 15MCL6, McLean County, Kentucky. Eaton Site. Feature #5 and Feature #4, NE profile.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Mississippian Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: Profile shows plowline soil with subplowline topsoil. In the foreground extend the wings of the south corner of the house-structure foundation. Between these two wings and under the plowline is indicated the darker soil of the house-floor (Feature #5). At the extreme left of the profile the remnant of a midden pit beneath the plowline is indicated (Feature #4). View is toward the Northeast. From Notes: Weather -- clear and sunny. Adjustments -- f 32; 1/2 second. Subject -- 60' profile showing remnant of Feature #4 and foreground extension as walls of Feature #3. Scope -- R-2 - L-7. Camera position -- 75-R-4.
